Translations.Text: Those who brought the lie (and accusation) were a bunch of you. Do not think that it is bad for you, but it is good for you. For every one of them earned a share of the sin, and the one among them who had greatest (share) of it, has a great punishment
Why when you heard it, the believing men and the believing women did not think well of themselves and they did not say: this is an obvious lie
Why did they not bring four witnesses for it? So when they did not bring the witnesses, then they are the liars in God’s view
And if it was not for God’s grace and mercy on you in this world and in the hereafter, a great punishment would have touched you because of what you engaged in it
When you receive it through each other’s tongues and you say with your mouths what you have no knowledge of it, and you think it is insignificant, while it is significant in God's view
And whey when you heard it, you did not say: it is not for us to speak of this, You are flawless, this is a great slander
God advises you that do not ever repeat anything like it if you are believers
And God clarifies the signs for you, and God is knowledgeable and wise
Indeed those who like to spread the indecency among those who believed have a painful punishment in this world and the hereafter, and God knows and you do not know
And if it was not for God’s grace and mercy on you, (you would be in trouble) and indeed God is gentle and merciful
